scripts.frontend:start: npx cross-env EXPO_USE_PROJECT_ROOT=%FRONTEND_SYMLINK% npx expo start -c
scripts.frontend:android:build: npx cross-env EXPO_USE_PROJECT_ROOT=%FRONTEND_SYMLINK% npx expo run:android
scripts.frontend:ios:build: npx cross-env EXPO_USE_PROJECT_ROOT=%FRONTEND_SYMLINK% npx expo run:ios
scripts.frontend:web: npx cross-env EXPO_USE_PROJECT_ROOT=%FRONTEND_SYMLINK% npx expo start --web
